name: Quinoa and Lentil Pilaf
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, low sugar, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, fall, spring, summer, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 medium size yellow or red onion, finely chopped
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil over medium-low heat in a large nonstick skillet and add onion. Cook, stirring, until tender and just beginning to color, 5 to 8 minutes. Add a generous pinch of salt and garlic and continue to cook, stirring, until garlic is fragrant, another 30 seconds to a minute. Add remaining oil and stir in quinoa and lentils. Add herbs and pepper, stir together, taste and adjust salt. Remove from heat and serve, adding a squeeze of lemon to each serving.
